item.description:
I have just picked up some Teddy Bears (about 15 inches tall) from the Salvation Army
They need to be dressed and returned to them for needy children .
There will also be a contest categories are :
most original,
Best Dressed,
Best Totally Homemade
Best Character Bear

This judging will be held Early December at The Sunrise Assisted living in Arlington.

To Get Teddy Ready for Christmas .
Where- Abeille 45 Harvard Street Brookline,
When- Sunday October10th 11am - till 1 pm in back room,
Can move to front if we need more time but no electricity(outlet).

If this is popular we might be able to get more for another Meetup.They have also included a paper pattern to sew a boy or girl outfit. For those who wish to sew an outfit . I have included a photo the bears are either white,tan or caramel .

Will bring along some misc items .
Please bring anything you might like to dress a bear with.
Feel free to contact me with any questions you might have .Thanks

group.name: Greater Boston Jewelry Design and DIY Crafts Meetup Group

item.name: Get Teddy Ready for Christmas - Dress Teddy to give to a needy child
